title: ‘Aboriginal kitsch’ Jedda plate
brief_description: Due to Jedda’s popularity and interest in Aboriginal ‘kitsch’ and culture, Arrernte actress Kunoth-Monks and Jedda became entwined. But she never acted again, instead becoming an advocate for Australia’s First Peoples.
description: Memorabilia ceramic plate featuring an illustrated portrait of Rosalie Kunoth-Monks from the film Jedda. Plate is round with illustration printed in centre in shades of browns on a creamy white background. Verso of plate is white with two holes related to hainging of plate.
